NewsArticle.Title: Pet Store Coming Soon
NewsArticle.Content:
<I>Greetings Aislings,
I am pleased to announce my pet store opening soon in the town of Tagor. It is currently under construction and will be opening as soon as it is finished. I have a variety of pets to sell, so start saving up! I also have a pet that has never been seen in the lands of Temuair. Hope to see you all at the Grand Opening.
Areini Pet Merchant<I/>
((Opening on Friday the 24nd))
